member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies configuration support flags for H.264 video encoding.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264_FLAG_CABAC_ENCODING_SUPPORT
member.summary: Support for context-adaptive binary arithmetic coding (CABAC) encoding.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264_FLAG_INTRA_SLICE_CONSTRAINED_ENCODING_SUPPORT
member.summary: Support for slice constrained encoding in which every slice in a frame is encoded independently from other slices in the same frame. This mode restricts the motion vector search range to the region box of the current slice, e.g. motion vectors outside the slice boundary can't be used.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264_FLAG_BFRAME_LTR_COMBINED_SUPPORT
member.summary: Support for using B-frames and long term references at the same time.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264_FLAG_ADAPTIVE_8x8_TRANSFORM_ENCODING_SUPPORT
member.summary: Support for using adaptive 8x8 transforms when encoding.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264_FLAG_CONSTRAINED_INTRAPREDICTION_SUPPORT
member.summary: Support for constrained intraprediction, that if activated will force the encoding of each intra-coded block with residual data only from other intra-coded blocks, e.g. not from inter-coded blocks. This refers to constrained_intra_pred_flag in the picture parameter set (PPS).
